physical_appearance: "The image shows a colour photograph. It is rectangular and it features buildings, people, vehicles, and rickshaws on the street. ""Waterloo Street"" is stated on a street name sign at the centre of the photograph. In the background towards the left hand side
title_text: Waterloo Street Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_1: the dome of a building is partially visible. It is blocked by a building with a triangular shaped roof. There is a tall tree at the centre of the photograph as well." buildings (structures)
